page.title: 19HOUSING COSTS IN CLANFIELD
page.content: The price of sheltered housing ranges from Â£27,500 to Â£33,500 leasehold,plus a charge of approximately Â£10 weekly for each unit in respect of running costs covering repairs and maintenance and the cost of employing a resident warden. In addition each occupant is responsible for general water and sewerage rates,ground rent and fuel bills,currently estimated at about Â£11.70 per week. In order to cover outgoing costs a supplementary income is needed in addition to the state retirement pension of Â£57.30 for a married couple and Â£35.80 for a single person,which are the rates of payment in October 1985.
